full_output.summary: As a result-driven individual, I leverage my expertise in Python, Robotics, 3D Modelling and Pneumatics & Hydraulics Systems to drive technological advancements and explore opportunities at the intersection of technology and human experience. With a passion for pushing boundaries, I'm committed to collaborating on projects that foster growth. I am actively seeking roles in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Robotics, and Automation fields, where I can apply my skills to drive innovation.

projects.name: Solar Powered Servo-Driven IOT Based Hydroponics Vertical Tower Garden
projects.description: Built a Tower Garden, a vertical hydroponic system leveraging IoT technology, equipped with solar panels and omnidirectional wheels to provide a time-efficient and cost-effective alternative to conventional gardening.

projects.name: Intelligent Traffic Flow Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed/Implemented/Tested a traffic flow prediction framework called 'The Intelligent Traffic Prediction with Dijkstra and LSTM System' to find the best routes.

projects.name: Covid -19 Detection using Neural Networks
projects.description: Performed data augmentation on image datasets for training/testing to create a learning model that runs prediction on whether a patient is suffering from COVID-19 in Jupyter Notebook.

projects.name: Handwritten Digit Recognition
projects.description: Created a training and testing dataset to perform feature scaling. Sequential model was used for feature extraction. The model was compiled and tested for accuracy in Jupyter Notebook.

projects.name: Research Project - Transformative Quadruped
projects.description: Studied/Designed quadruped capable of switching between two locomotion i.e., rolling and walking in TinkerCAD.

experiences.description: Assisted in receiving & inspecting moulds sent by customers, ensuring they meet company standards and customer requirements. Gained insights into the programming of the control systems, quality control measures, injection and blow moulding manufacturing processes and the integration of robotics in handling and assembling tasks, reducing manual labour and increasing productivity. Observed and analysed defects & non-conformities, identifying root causes and implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence.

experiences.company_name: Brain O Vision Solutions India Pvt Ltd
experiences.description: Gained practical experience in data science methodologies and applications to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world projects, enhancing problem-solving and analytical skills. Worked extensively with data manipulation tools such as Pandas, NumPy, including creating and managing data frames. Learned feature engineering techniques to improve model performance.

Trained under Edu-versity on the implementation of various models such as Nave Bayes, Logistic Regression, KNN etc. Gained experience working with ML frameworks such as Keras, TensorFlow and utilized Matplotlib for visualizing data and presenting insights.
